group_1.textLeft: Ugh...

group_1.textRight: *Groan*

group_1.textLeft: Sorry... I may be tough, but man that hurt...

group_1.textRight: Hold on!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right. Your unique magic...
You can heal wounds, can't ya...
Thanks, Iroha.

group_1.textRight: It's the least I could do!
I'm really sorry I can't do more to help...

group_1.textLeft: You don't...need to apologize for that...
We can save everyone if we beat Eve.
Yeah. The city, the people in it, and your@little sis. We all wanna save 'em.
Huh?! Why didn't that do anything?

group_1.textRight: Sayaka, calm down!

group_1.textLeft: How can you say that when other Magical@Girls are getting owned?!
This isn't the time to go cowering in a@corner!

group_1.textRight: I-I didn't, I wasn't trying to...
Just smashin' it like that you're gonna use@up all your magic and get yourself killed.

group_1.textLeft: Urgh...

group_1.textRight: She's right. We need to find its weak point.
This time it's facing...
...over toward the Suitoku Shopping Center.

group_1.textLeft: That's where Banbanzai is!
I have to save it! My grandpa built that@restaurant...

group_1.textRight: Tsuruno, where are you going?!
You can't save anything if you go alone!

group_1.textLeft: Well, what SHOULD I do then?!
Everyone might've evacuated already,@yeah...
But Banbanzai itself can't evacuate!

group_1.textRight: Calm down. Aren't you supposed to be the@Mightiest Magical Girl?!
You can't brute force your way past this!
Remember what we can do at our best!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Master... Just, we're taking so much@time finding its weak point...

group_1.textRight: Fine! I'll make a weak point FOR ya!

group_1.textLeft: Felicia!

group_1.textRight: I'll smash it so hard with my magic it'll @forget everythin'!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:1017A03]And with this...begone!

group_1.textCenter: No matter how many I kill, more just keep @coming.
I suppose this death parade will keep on@marching until everything's gone to ruin...
(I wished to destroy Kamihama...and now here@I am.)
(Thinking of it in those terms, I really @can't apologize enough to everyone...)
(This must be punishment for trying to @protect this city...)

group_1.textRight: Mitama! We're all clear over here!
The townspeople appear to have evacuated!

group_1.textLeft: That might actually be a blessing.
Now we can stop focusing on rescuing@people...
And devote ourselves to fighting Familiars.

group_1.textCenter: We can't tell yet when the next wave of@Familiars will show up.
I'll give you two these, so you can prepare@for when they do.

group_1.textRight: Grief Seeds?
Can we really take these?

group_1.textCenter: Of course. The situation is serious.
Consider this a special one-time treat from@your Coordinator.
I'll be handing them out to the other girls,@too, so don't worry about them.

group_1.textRight: In that case I'll be glad to take one!

group_1.textLeft: We'll move on now and try to find more@Familiars.

group_1.textRight: Yes. Let's methodically crush them.
Oh! Speak of the devil... I just sensed more@Familiars.
Oh no, Sasara!
The magic I'm sensing is back at the school@we were just at!

group_1.textLeft: They're targeting the evacuees?!
Saving human lives is the priority here...@Asuka, come on! Hurry!
Bwharm!

group_1.textRight: Bwhotsh whbots!
